Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 38th overall pick, by Detroit in 1965...
Injured on 5/19/1966 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/28/1966 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/15/1966 with a Broken Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/28/1968...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1970, off Dooley Womack (NYY)...
Injured on 4/11/1971 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for entire career...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1976, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
